gate.gui.docview

Class DocumentEditor

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • gate.creole.AbstractVisualResource
              • gate.gui.docview.DocumentEditor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ActionsPublisher, Resource, FeatureBearer, NameBearer, VisualResource, ImageObserver, MenuContainer, Serializable, Accessible

    @CreoleResource(name="Document Editor",
                guiType=LARGE,
                resourceDisplayed="gate.Document",
                mainViewer=true)
public class DocumentEditor
extends AbstractVisualResource
implements ActionsPublisher
    This is the GATE Document viewer/editor. This class is only the shell of the main document VR, which gets populated with views (objects that implement the DocumentView interface. Contains a search dialog and an option menu button.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
